subject: Missing haptic motors
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN team,

Today I took delivery of my order of plus X pedals. Unfortunately I am
missing the haptic reactors which should have been included in the order.
This is the only box I received and they are not in there.

My ordernumber is #SSN3330. Please address the matter and investigate the
issue. If there is more information needed, feel free to contact me.

With kind regards
Luc Buijtels

Ps. The pedals look awesome!

conversations.body_text: Hi Luc Buijtels,    Here is another link for your logistics tracking.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047045308356
